original_text: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.
korean_text: 또 너희 다섯이 백을 쫓고 너희 백이 만을 쫓으리니 너희 대적들이 너희 앞에서 칼에 엎드러질 것이며

sentences.original_text: And five of you shall chase an hundred
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 다섯 사람이 백 사람을 쫓을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 백 사람이 만 사람을 쫓을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 대적들이 칼에 맞아 너희 앞에 엎드러지리라
